text: Don Carter may refer to: *Don Carter (bowler) (1926–2012), American professional bowler *Don Carter (businessman) (1933–2018), basketball entrepreneur *Don Carter (footballer) (1921–2002), footballer for Bury FC and Blackburn Rovers *Don Carter (ice hockey) (born 1936), Canadian ice hockey player *Don Carter, creator of the TV short Happy Monster Band
title: Don Carter
